title: Incoming calls go straight to voicemail (pixel 3)
content: I have this issue on my pixel 3, already changed the phone 3 times, changed the sim card, but for some reason half of my incoming calls go straitgh to voicemail, and i dont even get notified about it, sometimes i dial my number and the phone does not ring at all, it goes to voicemail .. i tried every thing to fix this, i missed a lot of important phone calls because of this..any suggestions?
